name: Beat Parsec
description:
Your ship engine broke down and you need to survive waves of enemy with power of music.

Control:
Left, right: move left/right
Space: shoot
Press the controls along with the music beats.

This game made for (Re)vision Jam 2 (8 Bits to Infinity) submission.

Credits:

Music:
Werq by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4616-werq
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Sprites:
- Space shooter by kenney.nl
- Planets with Space Background by DinV Studio from Unity AssetStore
